item.title: Americans convicted in Congo of a botched coup attempt now face US charges
item.description: Three Americans repatriated to the United States from Congo were charged Wednesday by the U.S. Justice Department with staging an elaborate coup attempt aimed at overthrowing the African nationâ€™s government.

item.title: A pipeline company filed hundreds of lawsuits against landowners. Now its project is threatened
Previous execution reveals how South Carolina will put 2nd inmate to death by firing squad
